comments: NO reason why people should not do well. She completely prepares you for the tests, holds study sessions, and even let us make "cheat sheet" for the exams. She gave us her cell # in case we needed to call for extra help. There were people in my class that never came, didnt do HW and then wondered why they were failing. You have actually try people!

I can see why the people below commented the way they did, but dont go by that. If you are a student of average intelligence this class is super easy. She was very helpful, would go over countless practice problems, until everyone understood. She was very friendly with my class, but doesn\'t have patience for students that dont go home and do the wo

I actually took her and boy...I hated the day i walked in her class,she is very rude,she acts like we are there to be chemists...chemistry is a difficult class...but not that difficult...I had to drop her She also relies too much on ANGEL..it wasnt even an on line Class...Take someone ELSE if you can!

professor looks at you like you are stupid if you ask a question. made comment to class when asked to explain something again that she didn\'t want to repeat "that\'s what tutors and homework are for" and didn\'t go over material again. argues with students about irrelivent subjects.
